name: System Information Verification
description: Comprehensive system information validation including CPU, OS version, activation status, installed software, and minimum hardware requirements.

parameters.name: CPU_ProcessorName
parameters.help: Required processor name pattern (case-insensitive substring match)

parameters.name: WindowsUpdate_MaxDaysSinceLastUpdate
parameters.help: Maximum days since last Windows Update

parameters.name: CPU_MinFrequency
parameters.help: Minimum required current CPU running frequency in GHz

parameters.name: Windows_MustBeActivated
parameters.help: Whether Windows must be activated. If true, Windows must be activated; if false, Windows must NOT be activated

parameters.name: RequiredSoftware
parameters.help: JSON array of software names that must be installed on the system

parameters.name: MinimumRequirements
parameters.help: JSON object defining minimum system requirements: cores (int), memoryGB (int), diskTotalGB (int), webcamCount (int)
